name: ExptML: A Markup Language for Science
short_description: The Experiment Markup Language (ExptML) is a markup language, in XML, designed to store all the data and metadata (context) from all parts of the scientific process.  The format has a central schema that is used by a schema set that defines 26 different datatypes that are the building blocks of what scientists do when they do experiments in a laboratory.
summary: A markup language designed to capture science data and its context
